title: National Geographic Magazine Vol. 01 No. 4
description:
National Geographic Magazine Volume 1 Number 4 published in 1889. Topics of articles are:

Irrigation in California
Round about Asheville
A Trip to Panama and Darien
Across Nicaragua with Transit and Machéte

(Summary by Rapunzelina)
